text: Shivangi Joshi (born 18 May 1998) is an Indian actress known for her work on Hindi television. Joshi is widely recognised for portraying Naira Singhania Goenka in Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai. == Filmography == === Movies === Year Title Role Notes Ref. 2020 Love X Society Geetanjali Short film === Television === Year Title Role Notes 2013 Khelti Hai Zindagi Aankh Micholi Trisha 2013–2014 Beintehaa Aayat Haider Malik 2015–2016 Begusarai Poonam Kumari Thakur 2016–2021 Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai Naira Singhania Goenka 2021 Sirat Shekhawat Goenka 2021–2022 Balika Vadhu 2 Anandi Bhujaaria Chaturvedi 2022 Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi 12 Contestant 12th place 2023–2024 Barsatein – Mausam Pyaar Ka Aradhana "Aaru/Radhy" Sahni == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people
title: Shivangi Joshi
